worldview_assumptions: Cognition is Context-Dependent: Thinking does not happen in a vacuum; it requires anchors.
Movement Creates Meaning: Understanding is dynamic, arising from traversing relationships.
Structure Emerges from Exploration: Rigid systems fail; order must grow organically from chaos.
Knowledge is a Network: Everything is connected; isolation is artificial.
The Brain Needs an Exocortex: Biological cognition is limited and benefits from external structure (IES).
Questions Drive Learning: Answers are endpoints; questions are the engines of progress.
